body:
Hi Begum,


I have to admit that I did not really understand yet what exactly you 
want to do. On your original question though, you can use any shell 
script from within you scene with a preceding exclamation mark. It is up 
to you then what you do inside this script, e.g. call xform using some 
environment variables. You just need to make sure that it writes valid 
radiance geometry to stdout.


Kolay gelsin, Lars.
